definition: to be nothing difficult/to be a cinch
(negative prefix)/not/no
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
old variant of 話|话[hua4]
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: I'm thinking, breaking into a building isn't too far outside your wheelhouse .
sentences.chinese: 我在想偷偷进入一栋楼对你来说应该不在话下吧？

sentences.english: Sure, you can write blog posts … but a whole ebook?
sentences.chinese: 你写写博客自然不在话下，不过，写完一整本电子书？

sentences.english: A few months ago. I could jog with-out any problem.
sentences.chinese: 几个月前，我慢跑根本不在话下。

sentences.english: He can speak Spanish, let alone English.
sentences.chinese: 他能说西班牙文，英语就更不在话下了。

sentences.english: At home I do all the housework by myself. I paint the walls and fit tiles," said defender Ndzovela.
sentences.chinese: 我在家承担了全部家务，刷墙砌砖都不在话下。
再大的困难也不在话下。

sentences.english: Until recent weeks, the economic troubles seemed surmountable. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 直到几周前，经济动荡似乎还不在话下。

sentences.english: I love the “old man” look, notto mention they look super comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢它们看上去老气的感觉，超级舒适更不在话下。

sentences.english: Grommet cinch closure with long tassels.
sentences.chinese: 扣眼长流苏不在话下封闭。

sentences.english: He thinks the rest of us are beneath his notice.
sentences.chinese: 他认为我们这些人全不在话下。

sentences.english: If there's spirit, the scoreboard takes care of itself.
sentences.chinese: 有了团队精神，屡屡得分便不在话下了。

definition: a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
stretch a hand and grab it (idiom); very easy
enough and to spare (idiom)
not to pose a problem for sb/cannot stump sb
lit. to stretch a hand and grab it (idiom)/fig. easy to do
easy as a hand's turn (idiom); very easy/no effort at all
needless to say/it goes without saying
to not need dwell on (idiom)
as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

definition: easy/with no difficulty
(neologism c. 2009) don't worry, it's all taken care of
couldn't be better/ideal/wonderful
cannot do without/to be unavoidable/are bound to be many
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back
effortless/not expending the slightest effort
not inferior in any respect
